about_the_game:
This DLC allows you to play with a special "Ukrainian" body painting right from the start.
The purpose of this add-on is to support the Ukrainian fighters for freedom who heroically resist the aggressors, defending their home, families, and honor.
If you want to help and be rewarded with this great Bodypainting- you have the opportunity to support our neighbors from Ukraine by purchasing this DLC.

All our (Madmind Studio) proceeds from this DLC will be allocated solely to support Ukraine.
To clarify - all the income that goes to the developer. The donation is coming from our (Madmind Studio) proceeds of the revenue, and not the total sales or net sales.

Thank you!


It does not contain scenes of a sexual nature or adult-only content.

This DLC allows you to play with a special "Ukrainian" body painting right from the start.
The purpose of this add-on is to support the Ukrainian fighters for freedom who heroically resist the aggressors, defending their home, families, and honor.
If you want to help and be rewarded with this great Bodypainting- you have the opportunity to support our neighbors from Ukraine by purchasing this DLC.

All our (Madmind Studio) proceeds from this DLC will be allocated solely to support Ukraine.
To clarify - all the income that goes to the developer. The donation is coming from our (Madmind Studio) proceeds of the revenue, and not the total sales or net sales.

Thank you!

name: Succubus - Ukraine Support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: i5-6500, Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050, RX 460 (or equivalent with at least 4GB of memory)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: i5-8600, Ryzen 5 3400G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060, RX 5700 (with at least 6GB of memory)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
